content:
Enable Einstein Service Replies

To get started with Einstein generative AI, turn on Service Replies.

Available in: Lightning Experience, Enterprise and Unlimited Editions with the Einstein for Service add-on

USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED:
Customize Application to activate an Einstein Reply Recommendations model

Einstein Service Replies follows a chat conversation as it unfolds and drafts replies for agents to review. Set up grounding from Setup, Quick Find box > Reply Recommendations, and select Einstein Reply Recommendations.

Turn on Einstein for Service: Service Replies. Set Up Grounding in the Knowledge base. Enable Reply Recommendations before setting up Knowledge grounding. 

Give Agents Access
title: Enable AI-Powered Replies in Salesforce
